key_0.name: Grateful Dead
key_0.set1: So Many Roads 1st rehearsal Garcia teaches chords to band So Many Roads take 1 So Many Roads take 2 So Many Roads take 3 (begining w/ vocal harmonies only) So Many Roads takes 4 & 5 So Many Roads take 6 So Many Roads vocal harmonies Chuck Berry & Weir on Ketamine Cowboy song Topsy Part 1 (Cozy Cole) Phil teaches Wave to the Wind to the band It's a Man's World ( Vince lead vocal) Wave to the Wind (fades)
key_0.comment: Rehearsal. (See 2/21/92. The songlist are identical. Only 1 version of So Many Roads is kept on the archive for the date 2/13/92. The rest are under the 2/21/92 date.This comment added on 4/16/05.)

key_1.name: Grateful Dead
key_1.set1: Corinna, Corrina Tuning and Strumming, So Many Roads (chord changes 5x), So Many Roads (intro 4x), So Many Roads (4x), Got a Horse, Along the Navajo Trail, Topsy, Wave To The Wind (2x), Instrumental, It's a Man's World, Wave To The Wind
key_1.comment: Outtakes from the So Many Roads sessions. The Instrumental sounds like a hybrid between Fur Elise and Tico, Tico.

key_2.name: Grateful Dead
key_2.set1: Bertha > Promised Land, Stagger Lee, Wang Dang Doodle, So Many Roads, Queen Jane Approximately, Loose Lucy, Wave To The Wind > Don't Ease Me In
key_2.set2:
One More Saturday Night, Mississippi Half-Step Uptown Toodeloo, Estimated Prophet > He's Gone > Drums > Space > The Wheel > All Along The Watchtower > Black Peter > Sugar Magnolia
E: U.S. Blues

key_3.name: Grateful Dead
key_3.set1: Hell In A Bucket, El Paso, Walkin' Blues, Ramble On Rose, Way To Go Home, Black Throated Wind, Corinna
key_3.set2: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Playin' In The Band-> Terrapin Station-> Jam-> Drums*, Jam-> I Need A Miracle, Stella Blue-> Throwing Stones-> Not Fade Away, E: Box Of Rain

key_4.name: Grateful Dead
key_4.set1: Touch Of Grey, Feel Like A Stranger, Friend Of The Devil, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Althea, Cassidy
key_4.set2: Iko Iko-> Corinna-> The Other One-> Way To Go Home-> The Other One Jam-> The Same Thing-> Drums-> Jam-> Wave To The Wind-> The Other One-> So Many Roads-> Turn On Your Love Light, E: The Mighty Quinn

key_5.name: Grateful Dead
key_5.set1: Jack Straw, Althea, Victim Or The Crime, Row Jimmy, Memphis Blues, So Many Roads, Picasso Moon, Don't Ease Me In

University Of Nevada At Las Vegas
* - w/ Steve Miller
